name: Stock Performance Dashboard
title: Daily Stock Performance & Trends
description: Real-time monitoring of stock prices, trends, and performance metrics

elements.title: Stock Price Trends (90 Days)
elements.query: SELECT date, symbol, close FROM `financial-analytics-demo.financial_data.stock_prices` WHERE date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 90 DAY) ORDER BY date

elements.title: Daily Trading Volume
elements.query: SELECT DATE(timestamp) as date, symbol, SUM(quantity) as volume FROM `financial-analytics-demo.financial_data.market_trades` WHERE DATE(timestamp) >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 30 DAY) GROUP BY date, symbol

elements.title: Risk vs. Return (Volatility vs. Price Change)
elements.query: SELECT symbol, volatility, price_change_pct FROM `financial-analytics-demo.financial_data.market_metrics` WHERE date = CURRENT_DATE() - 1

elements.title: Top Performers
elements.query: SELECT symbol, price_change_pct, total_volume, buy_sell_ratio FROM `financial-analytics-demo.financial_data.market_metrics` WHERE date = CURRENT_DATE() - 1 ORDER BY price_change_pct DESC LIMIT 10
